name: The Pancakes Official Game Show
description:
DESCRIPTION: 

This is the Bob story. Bob likes to shake his arms and eat food but one day something unexpected will change his life forever. Bob is one of the lucky 200 participants who will compete in a crazy game show with a prize of one million pancakes! Will he win?

FEATURES:

• Talking pancakes
• Explosions
• People watching you
• You can push people into the lava
• Jumpscares
• All

FOLLOW ME ON:
